title: Consolidate local model providers into single 'Local' tab

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Completed local MLX model scanning:
- Implemented get_local_mlx_models() to scan ~/.lmstudio/models
- Scans for directories with config.json and .safetensors files
- Displays local MLX models with size info
- Shows alongside HuggingFace suggestions (no duplicates)
- Users can now see their downloaded MLX models in the Local tab

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Fixed missing CSS for local model tables:
- Added CSS for #tables-container
- Added CSS for .section-label (Ollama/GGUF/MLX headers)
- Added CSS for .local-table (individual tables)
- Tables should now display correctly with proper spacing

Users should now see all GGUF and MLX models in the Local tab.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Fixed table initialization timing issue:
- Added is_mounted check in watch_active_provider to prevent premature population
- The reactive watcher was being triggered during __init__ before compose() ran
- This caused 'No nodes match #ollama-table/gguf-table/mlx-table' errors
- Now on_mount properly handles initial table building and population

GGUF and MLX tables should now appear correctly in the Local tab.
